reuters.title: MORTON THIOKOL <MTI> GETS 61.4 MLN DLR CONTRACT
reuters.body: Morton Thiokol Inc's Wasatch Operations is being awarded a 61.4 mln dlr contract modification finalizing a previously awarded contract for missile rocket motors for Terrier, Tarter and Aegis ships, the Defense Department said. It said the work is expected to be completed in October 1987. Reuter 
